QuestData.Title: Strike While the Iron is Hot
QuestData.Description: With the Will of the Genesaur, we wield a powerful weapon.$b$bOur scouts have discovered an Iron Horde base, and I believe it is time to seize an opportunity.$b$bThey amass far to the north at the Iron Approach. This will not be easy, but we must deal a blow to the Iron Horde while we possess the artifact.$b$bWe are prepared to depart at your command. Speak with Grinslicer when you are ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Grinslicer to fly to the Iron Approach and attack the Iron Horde.
QuestData.RewardText: $n, we have dealt a great blow to the forces of the Iron Horde.
